products.title: Premium Leather Wallet
products.description: Handcrafted genuine leather wallet with multiple card slots and RFID blocking technology for maximum security.

products.title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Noise-cancelling headphones with 30-hour battery life, comfortable over-ear design, and exceptional sound quality.

products.title: Ceramic Pour-Over Coffee Maker
products.description: Elegant ceramic pour-over coffee dripper that extracts optimal flavor from your favorite coffee beans.

products.title: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: Soft, breathable 100% organic cotton t-shirt with a classic fit, available in multiple colors.

products.title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Double-walled insulated water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and eco-friendly.

products.title: Scented Soy Candle Set
products.description: Set of three hand-poured soy candles with essential oil fragrances including lavender, sandalwood, and vanilla.

products.title: Professional Yoga Mat
products.description: Extra thick, non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials providing excellent cushioning and stability for all yoga styles.

products.title: Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: Tactile mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting, programmable keys, and durable construction for gamers and typists.

products.title: Portable Power Bank
products.description: 20,000mAh fast-charging power bank with dual USB ports and USB-C compatibility for charging multiple devices on the go.

products.title: Bamboo Cutting Board Set
products.description: Set of three different sized bamboo cutting boards with juice grooves and handles, perfect for all food preparation needs.
